item.title: Recurse Center Day 2: BTree Node
item.description: This is a draft post that I have prematurely published. Currently, I am attending RC and I want to write as much as possible, log my daily learnings and activities. But, I also don't want to spend time on grammar and prose, so I am publishing all the posts which usually I'd have kept in my draft folder. B Tree I started working on the B Tree project, created a Github repo, put up skeleton code.

item.title: Recurse Center Day 1: init
item.description: This is a draft post that I have prematurely published. Currently, I am attending RC and I want to write as much as possible, log my daily learnings and activities. But, I also don't want to spend time on grammar and prose, so I am publishing all the posts which usually I'd have kept in my draft folder. My RC first day was filled with welcome events and fun activities.
